sections.heading: Repealed.Section 54-2-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:1978 Comp., § 54-2-1, enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 90, § 1; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 129, § 1206.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 129, § 1206 repealed 54-2-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 90, § 1, relating to the short title of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act, effective January 1, 2009. For provisions of former section,seethe 2009 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For limited partnerships formed on and after January 1, 2009,seethe Uniform Revised Limited Partnership Act, § 54-2A-101 NMSA 1978.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 129, § 1206 repealed 54-2-60 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 90, § 60, relating to expenses, effective January 1, 2009. For provisions of former section,seethe 2009 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1978 Comp., § 54-2-62, enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 90, § 62; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 129, § 1206.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 129, § 1206 repealed 54-2-62 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1988, ch. 90, § 62, relating to cases not provided for in the Uniform Limited Partnership Act. effective January 1, 2009. For provisions of former section,seethe 2009 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
